enb_long_title: Twentieth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: This contact group was co-chaired by Paul Watkinson (France) and Mohamed Mahmoud Ould El Ghaouth (Mauritania).
Co-Chair Watkinson said the negotiation text forwarded from SBI-19 would form the basis of discussions.
KENYA, for the G-77/China, suggested re-organizing the document under sub-headings, and circulated text with proposed changes and additions.

Several Parties, including the EU and US, supported the suggestion for re-organizing the text, with the US also circulating a proposal. Delegates worked to remove brackets, and presented changes and additions on, inter alia: a synthesis document on submissions on activities to meet the specific needs and circumstances of developing country Parties arising from the adverse effects of climate change and response measures; a call for submissions of views on insurance and risk measures; regional workshops; and mobilization of technical and financial resources.
Co-Chair Watkinson invited delegates to review and consult on the new proposals before the next contact group meeting.
